cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with the problem of securing distributed storage systems, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also discusses node failures and repair mechanisms, which are related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). Finally, the paper addresses the issue of bandwidth-limited scenarios, which is relevant to network information theory (cs.SI).
